description: The Angel (Thomas Halloway, often shortened to Tom Halloway) is a fictional character, a superhero in Marvel Comics Universe. Created by artist Paul Gustavson and an unconfirmed writer during the Golden Age of Comic Books, the Angel first appeared in Marvel Comics #1 (Oct. 1939), the first publication of Marvel Comics' predecessor, Timely Comics.The Angel is a non-superpowered detective who nonetheless wore a superhero costume.
name: Angel (Thomas Halloway)
